blogPost.title: How can I save up to be able to afford a down payment on a new home? Answer by Tiffany Aliche (@TheBudgetnista). https://t.co/r5SgPEJmqo https://t.co/6GWB1BRh9T
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 新築住宅の頭金を払えるようになるには、どうやって貯金すればいいですか？Answer by Tiffany Aliche (@TheBudgetnista). https://t.co/r5SgPEJmqo https://t.co/6GWB1BRh9T
我怎样才能积攒到能够支付新房的首付款？由Tiffany Aliche (@TheBudgetnista) 回答。https://t.co/r5SgPEJmqo https://t.co/6GWB1BRh9T
我怎樣才能積攢到能夠支付新房的首付款？由Tiffany Aliche (@TheBudgetnista) 回答。https://t.co/r5SgPEJmqo https://t.co/6GWB1BRh9T

previous.title: What are the new norms for working remote? Answer by @tsedal, Professor at @HarvardHBS. Author of Remote Work Revolution. https://t.co/J5aX5U7S1M https://t.co/kFtEnJ084N

localize.full_text: リモートワークの新常識とは？回答者：@tsedal（@HarvardHBS教授）。Remote Work Revolution』の著者。 https://t.co/J5aX5U7S1M https://t.co/kFtEnJ084N
远程工作的新规范是什么？回答者：@tsedal，@HarvardHBS的教授。远程工作革命》的作者。https://t.co/J5aX5U7S1M https://t.co/kFtEnJ084N
遠程工作的新規範是什麼？回答者：@tsedal，@HarvardHBS的教授。遠程工作革命》的作者。https://t.co/J5aX5U7S1M https://t.co/kFtEnJ084N

next.title: What are the top traits of a successful entrepreneur? Answer by @CWaltersPhD, Business & Branding Mentor, Corporate Training. https://t.co/vqGBphiZbL https://t.co/gyD8C1aJav

localize.full_text: 成功する起業家の特徴とは？Answer by @CWaltersPhD, Business & Branding Mentor, Corporate Training. https://t.co/vqGBphiZbL https://t.co/gyD8C1aJav
